Containers.Name: unraid.iSCSI
Containers.DonateText: If you wanna buy me a coffee.
Containers.Description:
The iSCSI plugin allows you to view your iSCSI config and in time to update. Currently buttons do not functon.
Kernel needs to support iSCSI, see Kernel Helper by ich777
Containers.Changes: Initial Release still WIP(Beta) Buttons don't function.
